body_content.explanation: to put information back into a computer, phone, or other machine using a keyboard or touchscreen, especially after you have removed it because it was not correct:
examples: After the supplier realized the mistake, they rekeyed all my details.
The new system saves time as nobody has to re-key any data.

body_content.explanation: to supply with a new key or new keys:
examples: The owner will arrange for a locksmith to rekey the property.
They had to rekey all the locks in the airport buildings.
